summary: This document appears to be a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, detailing various account types and requirements for individuals and businesses. It includes sections on customer identification policies, joint account disclosures, and responsibilities regarding tax compliance. The document emphasizes the importance of verifying identities to combat money laundering and terrorism financing.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the account holder in the context of a financial application with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Jetport, Inc
persons.context: Jetport, Inc is listed as a business entity associated with the account opening application.

keyFacts: The document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It includes various account types such as checking, money market, and certificate of deposit accounts.
There are requirements for customer identification to combat money laundering and terrorism financing.
The application mentions joint account disclosures and responsibilities for tax compliance.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as an account holder in the application.
